    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Gets the label of this Transition.
        Returns:
        the label of this Transition.

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(java.lang.String l)
        Sets the label of the Transition. To maintain consistency it's just a delegate to the petri net. So it also changes if it's necessary the alphabet of the net this Transition belongs to.
        Parameters:
        l - the label to set.

      • isFireable

        public boolean isFireable(Marking m)
        Checks if the transition is fireable under a given marking. To maintain consistency it's just a delegate to the petri net.
        Parameters:
        m - the marking of the petrinet.
        Returns:
        true when the transition is fireable.

      • fire

        public Marking fire(Marking m)
        Fires this transition under a given marking. To maintain consistency it's just a delegate to the petri net. It is not changing the given marking.
        Parameters:
        m - the marking.
        Returns:
        the resulting marking upon firing this transition.

      • getPreset

        public java.util.Set<Place> getPreset()
        Gets the preset for this transition. It is just casting the nodes of getPresetNodes in Places.
        Returns:
        the preset of this transition.

      • getPostset

        public java.util.Set<Place> getPostset()
        Gets the postset for this transition. It is just casting the nodes of getPostsetNodes in Places.
        Returns:
        the postset of this transition.
